001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.test;
002
003import java.util.Random;
004
005/**
006 * Utilities for integration testing server-side wallets
007 */
008public class WalletTestUtil {
009
010    /**
011     * Generate a valid, random wallet name. This is useful in integration testing.
012     *
013     * @return A wallet name of the form: <i>testwallet</i>-<i>ten-randomChars</i>
014     */
015    public static String randomWalletName() {
016        return randomWalletName("testwallet", 10);
017    }
018
019    /**
020     * Generate a valid, random wallet name. This is useful in integration testing.
021     *
022     * @param prefix Prefix, e.g. {@code "testwallet"}
023     * @param numRandomChars The number of random characters to add to the prefix
024     * @return A wallet name of the form: <i>prefix</i>-<i>randomChars</i>
025     */
026    public static String randomWalletName(String prefix, int numRandomChars) {
027        return String.format("%s-%s", prefix, generateRandomName(numRandomChars));
028    }
029
030    static String generateRandomName(int targetStringLength) {
031        int leftLimit = 97;     // letter 'a'
032        int rightLimit = 122;   // letter 'z'
033        Random random = new Random();
034
035        return random.ints(leftLimit, rightLimit + 1)
036                .limit(targetStringLength)
037                .collect(StringBuilder::new, StringBuilder::appendCodePoint, StringBuilder::append)
038                .toString();
039    }
040}
